name: Speed Is Key (1 Hour Game Jam)
name_original: Speed Is Key (1 Hour Game Jam)
description:
Two Downloads, one I made in the hour, one I added a few more features.

Move using Up and Down.

Features in the hour:

Object moving, instance creating, different screens, variables and finally some basic planning & art.

Extra Features (after the hour)

External Ini File read and write, points local and global variable, and a point display.

FEEDBACK:

"Perhaps enable players choose level of difficulty anddd maybe make some healthpacks or sumn" -Scarlet

"Add a harder difficulty, and health packs" - Brother
